tips.title: Context Windows Matter
tips.content: Did you know? You can dramatically improve response quality by structuring your prompts to fit within optimal context windows.
tips.example:
# Instead of one huge prompt:
"Write a complete marketing strategy..."

# Break it down:
"First, analyze the target audience..."
"Based on that analysis, suggest channels..."

tips.title: The Power of Examples
tips.content: Few-shot learning can transform your results. Always provide 2-3 examples of what you want.
tips.example:
"Format like this:
Topic: [Subject]
Tone: [Professional/Casual]
Length: [Word count]

Example:
Topic: AI Ethics
Tone: Professional
Length: 200 words"

tips.title: Role-Based Prompting
tips.content: Assign a specific role to the AI for more focused and expert responses.
tips.example:
"Act as a senior data scientist with 
expertise in predictive analytics. 
Analyze this dataset and provide 
insights on customer churn patterns."
